body:
The "Flutter Inspector" only shows 

```
JxBrowser installation failed. Retry installation? Open DevTools in the browser?
```

## Steps to Reproduce

Install Flutter plugin on IntelliJ 2021.3

## Version info

comment_data.body: In another issue, @tallinn1960 mentioned that this is working with Flutter plugin 63.1.4.

title: JxBrowser installation failed
